description.S1: Alonzo Vallejos of Byzantium's Bureau of Exploration has asked you to participate in a guided tour across the Halcyon system.

blurb.B1: The player must start the quest by speaking to Alonzo in Byzantium's Bureau of Exploration.
blurb.B2: Alonzo explains that the tour is conducted by going around Halcyon and activating a series of beacons,
blurb.B3: and returning to the Bureau of Exploration to claim a hat as a reward.

description.S1: Alonzo explained that the tour consists of locating a series of beacons,
description.S2: the first of which lies somewhere in Byzantium.

blurb.B1: The first beacon is located in Byzantium,
blurb.B2: on some grass in front of a building just outside the Bureau of Exploration.
blurb.B3: The player can simply hop over the low fence and activate the beacon.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, you're obviously not from around here. I don't believe I've ever seen visitors in the Bureau before, come to think of it.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Yeah? What gave it away?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm just here to take in the sights.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You don't know that. Maybe I work here.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: If you were from around here, you'd probably be off enjoying yourself in Prosperity Plaza, not poking around the Bureau.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Alonzo Vallejos. Extraordinarily pleased to make your acquaintance, and so on, and so forth.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm currently operating a sightseeing tour, of sorts. Think of it as a guided journey across Halcyon. Would you be interested in a trial run?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: How does this work?

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Glad you asked! Our tour guides you across some of the most picturesque and breathtaking sights around Halcyon.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: We've placed some beacons across a series of locations around Halcyon. All you have to do is follow the beacons... to adventure!

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: That slogan's a work in progress. So, what do you think? Are you interested?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right, I'll help you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I've seen plenty of Halcyon already. I'm not impressed.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Outstanding! Here, you'll need this special triangulating device. Think of it as a wireless compass, pointing the way to the next beacon.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: When you find a beacon, this device records your discovery and directs you to the next stop on your tour.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Find every beacon, finish your tour, and come back here to claim your commemorative hat. Simple!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right. I'm off.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'm starting to regret this already.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well then! That just makes you the perfect test subject. If my guided tours can impress you, they'll impress anyone.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Are you serious? You're a sight-seer? I didn't know people like you even existed! Oh, this is just too perfect.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: You don't look nearly bored enough to work here. Believe me, I know everyone here by face.
